mapper.select: select count(*) from user where isdeleted = 0
select count(*) from project where isdeleted = 0
select p.languagenum, l.languagemain, l.languagecolor, count(*) as languagecount from project p join language l on p.languagenum = l.languagenum group by p.languagenum
select SUBSTRING_INDEX(userid, '@', -1) as email, count(*) as emailcount from user where enabled = 1 and isdeleted = 0 group by email

select v.gen_date as date, ifnull(s.count, 0) as count from (select adddate('1970-01-01',t4*10000 + t3*1000 + t2*100 + t1*10 + t0) gen_date from (select 0 t0 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t0, (select 0 t1 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t1, (select 0 t2 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t2, (select 0 t3 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t3, (select 0 t4 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t4) v left join (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(statisticsdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, visit as count FROM statistics GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(statisticsdate,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(statisticsdate,'%Y-%m-%d')) s on v.gen_date = s.date where gen_date between #{startdate} and #{enddate}
